template.name: Template OS PVE
template.description: Template for monitoring a Proxmox Virtual Environment. Updated: 2018/07/20

item.name: PVE High Availability Cluster Resource Manager
PVE High Availability Local Resource Manager

trigger_prototype.name: {#PVENAME} CPU over 80% for last 15 minutes
trigger_prototype.description: {#PVENAME} has more then 80% CPU usage over the last 15 minutes

trigger_prototype.name: {#PVENAME} disk full
trigger_prototype.description: {#PVENAME} has no diskspace left over the last 10 minutes.

trigger_prototype.expression: ({Template OS PVE:pve.vm.disk-free[{#PVEID}].last(0,3600)}- {Template OS PVE:pve.vm.disk-free[{#PVEID}].last(0)})/ {Template OS PVE:pve.vm.disk-total[{#PVEID}].last(0)} > 0.1 and {Template OS PVE:pve.vm.pool[{#PVEID}].regexp({$PVE_TESTPOOL})}=0
trigger_prototype.name: {#PVENAME} disk space growing >10%/hr
trigger_prototype.description: {#PVENAME} diskspace is growing at more than 10% per hour.

trigger_prototype.name: {#PVENAME} free diskspace less then 5%
trigger_prototype.description: {#PVENAME} has less then 5% diskspace free over the last 10 minutes.

trigger_prototype.name: {#PVENAME} free diskspace less then 10%
trigger_prototype.description: {#PVENAME} has less then 10% diskspace free over the last 10 minutes.

trigger_prototype.name: {#PVENAME} free total memory less then 5%
trigger_prototype.description: {#PVENAME} has less then 5% memory + swap free over the last 10 minutes.

trigger.name: PVE Firewall logger process stopped on {HOST.NAME}
PVE Firewall manager process stopped on {HOST.NAME}
PVE High Availability Cluster Resource Manager process stopped on {HOST.NAME}
PVE High Availability Local Resource Manager process stopped on {HOST.NAME}
PVE REST API proxy server process stopped on {HOST.NAME}
PVE REST API server process stopped on {HOST.NAME}
PVE Status Daemon process stopped on {HOST.NAME}
